content:
The given code is part of a larger document that discusses creating and managing a graphical user interface (GUI) for a 3D rendering or game development application. The chunk in question adds a labeled frame titled "EXTEND CURVE" to the `extendPage` section, which likely pertains to curve manipulation within the application's interface.

## EXTEND PAGE ##
        extendFrame = tk.Frame(self.extendPage, relief = tk.SUNKEN,
                               borderwidth = 2)
        label = tk.Label(extendFrame, text = 'EXTEND CURVE',
                         font=('MSSansSerif', 12, 'bold'))
        label.pack(fill = tk.X)
